documents.document: Great hotel with a view of the Space Needle I stayed for at this hotel during two nights (but not consequtive). As a Priority Club Platinum I was give a room with the view fo the Space Needle the first night. The second night I was given suite with separate bedromm and large hot tub. As the view of the Space Needle was great I recommend asking for this at checkin.Also note that even though the Space Needle is close you can not walk the closest way as there is a freeway right i front of the hotel.
